general.company: Chengdu Xinzhu Road&Bridge Machinery Co Ltd
general.desc: Chengdu Xinzhu Road&Bridge Machinery Co Ltd mainly designs and produce functional parts and materials of a bridge, project machinery, and urban rail transportation equipment. Its products are utilized home and abroad by a road, railway, airport, hydraulic and municipal engineering. Chengdu Xinzhu's customers cover all over the country and Southeast Asia, the Middle East, Africa and Russia.
general.short_desc: Chengdu Xinzhu Road & Bridge Machinery Co., Ltd. is principally engaged in the research, development, design, production and distribution of road, railway and bridge function parts in China.

company_data.company: Chengdu Xinzhu Road&Bridge Machinery Co Ltd

rank_balancesheet.name: Financial Strength
rank_balancesheet.details: Chengdu Xinzhu Road&Bridge Machinery Co Ltd displays poor financial strength. Usually, this is caused by too much debt for the company.

zscore.name: Altman Z-Score
zscore.details: Altman Z-score of 0.23 is in distress zone. This implies bankruptcy possibility in the next two years.

fscore.name: Piotroski F-Score
fscore.details: Piotroski F-Score of 3 is low, which usually implies poor business operation.

interest_coverage.name: Interest Coverage
interest_coverage.details: Ben Graham prefers companies' interest coverage to be at least 5. Chengdu Xinzhu Road&Bridge Machinery Co Ltds earnings cannot cover its interest expense. If the situation continues, the company may have to issue more debt.

per share rev.name: Revenue per Share
per share rev.details: Chengdu Xinzhu Road&Bridge Machinery Co Ltd revenue per share has been in decline for the last 5 years.

Long-Term Debt.name: Long-Term Debt
Long-Term Debt.details: Chengdu Xinzhu Road&Bridge Machinery Co Ltd keeps issuing new debt. Over the past 3 years, it issued CNY 4 billion of debt.

Operating Income.name: Operating Income
Operating Income.details: Chengdu Xinzhu Road&Bridge Machinery Co Ltd has recorded a loss in operating income at least once over the past 3 years.

roic_vs_wacc.name: ROIC vs WACC
roic_vs_wacc.details: Company's return on invested capital is less than the weighted average cost of capital. It might not be capital efficient

mscore.name: Beneish M-Score
mscore.details: Beneish M-Score -2.2 no higher than -1.78, which implies that the company is unlikely to be a manipulator.
